extension.summary: vitorp07's Repository
extension.description: my repo

extension.summary: Switch Samsung TV into 3D mode when playing 3D movie
extension.description: When a 3D movie is started - the Samsung 3DTV that is connected by LAN will switch to respective 3D mode automatically
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
